comment: Just followed also wish there was less "NAZI WHITE POWER/BLM/ANTI SEMITIC RACIST BULLSHIT" on Gab too. I also love that you asked nicely and said "Please". I may have to stop just blocking people who express these views and try to encourage them to become more valuable members of . Whilst I respect their right to express their views, I maintain my right to argue against them, and should probably be more forceful in doing so.
